qualityFirst.title: We do everything for you
qualityFirst.description: We take everything upon ourselves: from planning and creative to results. We bring the project to completion within short timeframes and according to budget.

creativeSolutions.title: Meeting deadlines
creativeSolutions.description: You always receive your project on time: transparent work plan and agreed-upon project implementation timelines.

innovation.title: Everything for the client
innovation.description: We consider every detail — audit, meanings, visuals, metrics — so that the final effect is noticeable to both the team and your clients.

aboutUs.title: From idea to reality
aboutUs.subtitle: About Us
aboutUs.paragraph1: Circle Creative Buro — a creative buro on the market since June 2025. We turn business tasks into strong ideas and package them into understandable products and communications. We create unique selling propositions that haven't existed in the market yet, based on audience research, strategy, and clear efficiency criteria. For us, not only creativity and visuals are important, but also measurable results: growth in recognition, conversion, and sales.
aboutUs.paragraph2: Our task is to make your brand work noticeably and effectively: uniqueness should be readable from the first contact, and advantages should be obvious among analogues. We identify insights, build positioning, develop identity, websites and campaigns, create content, test hypotheses and optimize by metrics. We work transparently and on time, take coordination upon ourselves and bring the project to a result that exceeds expectations.

notes.note1: ✦ We don't take a commission for printing, you only pay for the production itself.
notes.note2: ✦ All materials (designs, photos, videos) must be approved by the client before publication.
notes.note3: ✦ Expedited completion (by agreement with the Client) is charged with a 50% markup on the base service cost.
notes.note4: ✦ After approval, changes can only be made within 2 calendar days.
notes.note5: ✦ We include 3 free rounds of revisions. Additional changes are subject to extra payment.

placeholderCards.text1: We turn client tasks into working solutions with measurable effect. We formulate goals, design paths, launch and achieve KPIs — leads, sales, recognition.Each project is unique — we research audience and context, test hypotheses, select tools and format to provide the best solution specifically for your task.
placeholderCards.text2: Every project is unique — we research the audience and context, test hypotheses, and select the tools and format to provide the best solution for your specific task.
placeholderCards.text3: Strategists, designers, and marketers work as a single team under the management of a PM. We take care of all coordination and are responsible for the result from brief to release.
placeholderCards.text4: We focus on tools that really drive metrics. We conduct A/B testing, measure effectiveness, and scale what brings results.
placeholderCards.text21: You can see the status, deadlines, and metrics at every stage. Weekly updates, a task board, and access to materials — no surprises or 'black boxes'.
placeholderCards.text22: We track trends and carefully implement innovations: new formats, tools, and AI approaches — only where it enhances your results.
placeholderCards.text31: No one-size-fits-all solutions. We take into account your brand's tone, goals, audience, and channel — creating a personalized scenario for your situation.
placeholderCards.text32: We work quickly and efficiently: realistic deadlines, SLAs for responses, checkpoints, and a single point of entry. Approvals are handled without delay.
placeholderCards.text33: We don't build campaigns, we build growth: roadmaps, hypotheses, funnels, unit economics. Regular iterations and scaling of working solutions.
placeholderCards.text34: We are deeply involved and maintain high quality standards. We proactively suggest improvements and make sure that this is reflected in every project and result.

hero.title: STEPPE COFFEE
hero.subtitle: Full cycle of brand creation: from strategy to implementation

brandPositioning.title: Brand Positioning
brandPositioning.description: We created a unique value proposition where Steppe Coffee is not just a coffee shop, but a
brandPositioning.descriptionContinued: where meanings are born, creativity gathers, coffee and culture come together.

targetAudience.title: Target Audience
targetAudience.description: During the target audience analysis, the main segments of potential visitors were identified:

professionals.title: Professionals
professionals.description: who value convenient space for work and meetings

creativeYouth.title: Creative Youth
creativeYouth.description: students looking for atmosphere for inspiration

urbanResidents.title: Urban Residents
urbanResidents.description: who consider the coffee shop as a place for quality relaxation

competitiveAnalysis.title: Competitive Analysis
competitiveAnalysis.description: We conducted a comparative analysis of direct and indirect competitors to determine a unique position.

directCompetitors.title: Direct Competitors
directCompetitors.description: local coffee shops with specialty coffee and cozy atmosphere

indirectCompetitors.title: Indirect Competitors
indirectCompetitors.description: chain coffee shops, restaurants with coffee menu, coworking spaces

toneOfVoice.title: Tone of Voice
toneOfVoice.description: A tone of voice has been developed for the Steppe Coffee brand, reflecting the values and character of the establishment:

friendly.title: Friendly and inspiring
friendly.description: creates a sense of openness and support

modern.title: Modern, but with local accents
modern.description: maintains closeness to the culture and identity of the city

informal.title: Informal, lively style
informal.description: helps communicate with the audience in the same language

socialMedia.title: Social Media
socialMedia.profileSetup: Set up profiles and conduct shoots for social media
socialMedia.analytics: Weekly statistics tracking and format improvement

menu.title: Menu
menu.description: Following a unified style, a new menu design was created

decoration.title: Coffee Shop Decoration
decoration.description: To maintain coziness, our team created printed materials for our client:

baristaManual.title: Barista Manual
baristaManual.description: To improve work inside the coffee shop, a document was created for training new employees (internal training wrapper)

advertising.title: Advertising Materials
advertising.description: We also developed advertising banners, lightboxes and brochures

uniform.title: Uniform
uniform.description: Uniform for baristas was also developed

newDesign.title: New Website Design
newDesign.description: Developed new website design with adaptation for different devices

adminPanel.title: Admin Panel
adminPanel.description: Also developed admin panel with automation for filling Google sheets

cms.title: Content Management System
cms.description: Developed modern CMS for content management with intuitive interface

employeeCards.title: Our Team
employeeCards.subtitle: We are a group of dedicated professionals with diverse skills and a shared passion for our work.

employee2.name: Shugyla Madikhan

employee5.name: Sundetova Aruzhan

employee6.name: Zhumasheva Alina

employee7.name: Adesh Dana

employee8.name: Murtazina Alina

employee9.name: Atabayeva Adina

employee10.name: Lessaly Aidana
